thread.title: Paid Search Manager - Sports Equipment

title: Paid Search Manager - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Paid Search Manager Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: Managing pay-per-click campaigns across multiple engines/properties to ensure the company's specific goals are met. Gather actionable data from various sources to ensure consistent and continual optimization of the campaigns. Role requires the ability to operate on both a strategic and tactical level   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
